title: Study Buddy!
snippet: The main goal of Study Buddy is to help students like me to study much better! The idea of Study Buddy is students make templates for let’s say a quiz, homework or basically a reviewer, in where the software mixes these questions and throws it back to you.This should also feature cross-platform a...

title: What a year! 2020 Here I come
snippet: Hey there! Seems like you’re interested in what I want to share :DLet me start off by saying thank you for being interested in what I want to share! Not everyone seems to be interested enough. D:So, okay. Enough with the chitchat!The year well started off good, I would say. Everything was doing a...
